attributes.additional_details:
There is much ambiguity on the data that is being produced that is readily proven misleading.
The second lockdown has been proven to be a projection of fear. 
Many more statistics have been questioned and the government have not acknowledged and other observations from other medical professionals who question lockdown and the effects on the population. 
The deaths by covid or with covid or many other illnesses or reason of deaths are debatable but classed as the virus.
attributes.background: Experts discussing government action, data, lockdown and wider effects of Covid to the population. With government medical advisors and medical professionals who denounce the government response and data. Also live questions from the audience.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a matter for broadcasters.
